definitions.text: the activity of exerting your muscles in various ways to keep fit
examples: the physical exertion required by his work kept him fit
he warned against the use of narcotic drugs
skilled in the utilization of computers

definitions.text: a task performed or problem solved in order to develop skill or understanding
examples: you must work the examples at the end of each chapter in the textbook

definitions.text: (usually plural) a ceremony that involves processions and speeches
carry out or practice; as of jobs and professions

examples: My personal trainer works me hard
this puzzle will exercise your mind
She works out in the gym every day
We drilled French verbs every day
